com.psddev.dari.util

Class TransformerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.TransformerBuilder

  • public class TransformerBuilder
extends Object
    For building common types of transformers.

    Typically, most objects will be converted to a map using a converter, with the include, exclude, rename, and transform methods used to control the transformation.

    For example, given the following 2 classes: 

     class Foo {
     String field1 = "foo1";
     String field2 = "foo2";
     transient String ignored = "foo3";
 }

 class Bar extends Foo {
     public String getExtra() {
         return "bar";
     }
 }

    The following would return a map that contains {field1=foo1,field2=foo2,extra=bar}: 

     Object transformed = new TransformerBuilder()
     .putAllFields(Foo.class)
     .putGetters(Bar.class, "extra")
     .toTransformer()
     .transform(new Bar());
